entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 14.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 14. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of rain beginning late this evening and ending before morning then 60 percent chance of showers. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 near midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers. High plus 5 with temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers early in the morning. Rain showers beginning in the morning then changing to 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 5 with temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Tuesday 11 April 2023
